item.title: Several large pot holes outside bus stop., 18th January
item.description:

item.title: Dead dog wrapped in a bag, 18th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Sweeps Lane, St Mary Cray, Greater London

item.title: Light not illuminating - asset number poor conditon, 18th January
item.description:
Yet another street light pole not illuminating and another where the asset tag is so degraded it is difficult to read. I have attached a photo so you can determine the correct identification. Please clean and reinstate the asset tag and fix the light. This is the second on this junction that is not working, please resolve urgently.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barnhill Avenue, Hayes, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter, 18th January
item.description:
Upper Holly Hill Road DA17 6HJ completely littered with glass bottles , rubbish, electronic cables ,and more. The whole road is covered in rubbish as the pupils from Bexley collage ( Holly Hill) are littering road constantly, this issue is ongoing for so long. Please send someone to pick up rubbish not the sweeping car as it won’t be able to clean ( cars are parked on the road) . Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Upper Holly Hill Road, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
